message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $925,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer.  I understand your perspective on the value, however, my initial offer reflected a significant discount on its true worth.  To move this forward, I can come down to $875,000.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so I'm proposing $812,500. I think this is a fair compromise.
